job.title: Software Engineer - EARLY CAREER
job.description:
The coolest jobs on this planet… or any other… are with Lockheed Martin Space. Lockheed Martin is a pioneer, partner, innovator and builder. Our amazing people are on a mission to make a difference in the world and every single day we use our skills and experiences to create, design and build solutions to some of the worlds’ hardest engineering problems.

Candidate will be responsible to Integrate the Flight Software, Space DB, Simulation Software/Hardware, Various In-House developed Tools into lab architecture to support program's multi-million dollar milestones. This is an entry level Software Engineering position where you will be developing an architecture that integrate various SW/HW into an existing Lab Environment to perform Risk Mitigations, System Validation and challenging Testing objectives in support of Satellite Missions.

This early career position will typically require 2 years of professional experience with a bachelor's degree in a related field.

obtaining and maintaining an active secret clearance will be required. (Must be a U.S. Citizen).

To promote the sharing of ideas, Lockheed Martin fosters an inclusive work environment that encourages differences and big-picture thinking.

Here Are Some Of The Benefits You Can Enjoy

Our employees play an active role in strengthening the quality of life where we live and work by volunteering more than 1.1 million hours annually.

  • 401k
  • Paid time off
  • Work/life balance
  • Career development
